info.title: Power Apps for Admins
info.description: Power Apps Management Connector for Administrators

get.summary: Get App Role Assignments as Admin

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: The date value of the API version.

parameters.name: $top
parameters.description: Number of App Role Assignments in the response.

id.description: PowerApp Role Assignment principal object ID.

post.description: Updates a PowerApp's owner role, and specifies the old owner's new role.

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: The date value of the API version.

parameters.name: Content-Type
parameters.description: The content type of the API request.

roleForOldAppOwner.description: The role name for the old app owner. Choose from CanView, CanViewWithShare, or CanEdit.
roleForOldAppOwner.title: Role For Old App Owner

newAppOwner.description: The principal object ID of the new owner.
newAppOwner.title: New PowerApp Owner

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: The date value of the API version.

parameters.name: Content-Type
parameters.description: The content type of the API request.

quarantineStatus.description: The quarantine status of the app. Choose from NotSpecified, Quarantined, or Unquarantined.
quarantineStatus.title: Quarantine Status

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: The date value of the API version.

parameters.name: Content-Type
parameters.description: The content type of the API request.

parameters.description: The date value of the API version.

parameters.name: $top
parameters.description: Number of Apps in the response.

parameters.name: $skiptoken
parameters.description: Used to get next page of responses.

roleName.description: The name of the permission role. Choose from CanView, CanViewWithShare, and CanEdit.
roleName.title: Role Name

NotifyShareTargetOption.description: Notifies the new user if provided the string value 'Notify'.
NotifyShareTargetOption.title: Notify Share Target Option

email.description: The principal email of the user.

id.description: The principal object ID of the user.

tenantId.description: The principal tenant ID of the user.
